00058             function                get_testing_object()
00059             {
00060                   try
00061                   {
00062                         if( $this->TestingObject === false )
00063                         {
00064                               $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' );
00065                               $PackageDirectory = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 
00066                                     $Security->get_gp( 'testing_package_name' , 'command' ) , 
00067                                     $Security->get_gp( 'testing_package_version' , 'command' , 'last' )
00068                               );
00069                               
00070                               if( file_exists( "$PackageDirectory/include/php/unit_tests.php" ) === false )
00071                               {
00072                                     return( false );
00073                               }
00074 
00075                               require_once( "$PackageDirectory/include/php/unit_tests.php" );
00076                               $this->TestingObject = new unit_tests();
00077                         }
00078                         
00079                         if( $this->TestingObject === false )
00080                         {
00081                               throw( new Exception( "Testing class was not found" ) );
00082                         }
00083                   }
00084                   catch( Exception $e )
00085                   {
00086                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00087                   }
00088             }

00112             function                security( $Options )
00113             {
00114                   try
00115                   {
00116                         $UserController = get_package( 'user::user_controller' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00117                         $UserController->login( $Options );
00118                         
00119                         $Permits = get_package( 'permit::permit_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00120                         if( $Permits->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'tester' ) === false )
00121                         {
00122                               $UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00123                               print( $UserAlgorithms->get_login() );
00124                               return( 'No permits' );
00125                         }
00126                         
00127                         return( false );
00128                   }
00129                   catch( Exception $e )
00130                   {
00131                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00132                   }
00133             }

00153             function                get_sub_test_count()
00154             {
00155                   try
00156                   {
00157                         /* gettting count of tests */
00158                         $this->get_testing_object();
00159 
00160                         $Methods = get_class_methods( get_class( $this->TestingObject ) );
00161                         
00162                         $Counter = 0;
00163                         foreach( $Methods as $key => $m )
00164                         {
00165                               if( strpos( $m , 'test' ) === 0 )
00166                               {
00167                                     $Counter++;
00168                               }
00169                         }
00170                         
00171                         return( $Counter );
00172                   }
00173                   catch( Exception $e )
00174                   {
00175                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00176                   }
00177             }
00178             
00197             function                get_sub_test_name()
00198             {
00199                   try
00200                   {
00201                         $this->get_testing_object();
00202                         
00203                         $Methods = get_class_methods( get_class( $this->TestingObject ) );
00204                         
00205                         $Counter = 0;
00206                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' );
00207                         foreach( $Methods as $key => $m )
00208                         {
00209                               if( strpos( $m , 'test' ) === 0 )
00210                               {
00211                                     if( $Counter == $Security->get_gp( 'test_id' , 'integer' ) )
00212                                     {
00213                                           return( $m );
00214                                     }
00215                                     $Counter++;
00216                               }
00217                         }
00218                         if( $Security->get_gp( 'test_id' , 'integer' , 0 ) >= $Counter )
00219                         {
00220                               return( 'Value test_id is too big. It mast be less than '.$Counter );
00221                         }
00222                   }
00223                   catch( Exception $e )
00224                   {
00225                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00226                   }
00227             }

00247             function                run_exact_test( $Methods , $m )
00248             {
00249                   try
00250                   {
00251                         if( in_array( 'set_up' , $Methods ) )
00252                         {
00253                               call_user_func_array( array( $this->TestingObject , 'set_up' ) , array() );
00254                         }
00255 
00256                         $Result = call_user_func_array( array( $this->TestingObject , $m ) , array() );
00257                         
00258                         if( in_array( 'tear_down' , $Methods ) )
00259                         {
00260                               call_user_func_array( array( $this->TestingObject , 'tear_down' ) , array() );
00261                         }
00262                         
00263                         return( $Result );
00264                   }
00265                   catch( Exception $e )
00266                   {
00267                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00268                   }
00269             }

00293             function                find_test_and_run( $Methods )
00294             {
00295                   try
00296                   {
00297                         $Counter = 0;
00298                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' );
00299                         
00300                         foreach( $Methods as $key => $m )
00301                         {
00302                               if( strpos( $m , 'test' ) === 0 && $Counter++ == $Security->get_gp( 'test_id' , 'integer' ) )
00303                               {
00304                                     return( $this->run_exact_test( $Methods , $m ) );
00305                               }
00306                         }
00307                         
00308                         if( $Security->get_gp( 'test_id' , 'integer' , 0 ) >= $Counter )
00309                         {
00310                               return( 'Value test_id is too big. It mast be less than '.$Counter );
00311                         }
00312                         else
00313                         {
00314                               return( 'Test was not called' );
00315                         }
00316                   }
00317                   catch( Exception $e )
00318                   {
00319                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00320                   }
00321             }

00341             function                run_sub_test()
00342             {
00343                   try
00344                   {
00345                         /* running subtest */
00346                         $this->get_testing_object();
00347                         $Methods = get_class_methods( get_class( $this->TestingObject ) );
00348                         
00349                         if( isset( $Methods[ 0 ] ) == false )
00350                         {
00351                               return( 'No test were found' );
00352                         }
00353                         
00354                         return( $this->find_test_and_run( $Methods ) );
00355                   }
00356                   catch( Exception $e )
00357                   {
00358                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00359                   }
00360             }
00361             
00380             function                run_views()
00381             {
00382                   try
00383                   {
00384                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' );
00385                         
00386                         if( $Security->get_gp( 'action' , 'command' , 'none' ) === 'get_sub_test_count' )
00387                         {                             
00388                               return( $this->get_sub_test_count() );
00389                         }
00390                         
00391                         if( $Security->get_gp( 'action' , 'command' , 'none' ) === 'get_sub_test_name' )
00392                         {
00393                               return( $this->get_sub_test_name() );
00394                         }
00395                         
00396                         if( $Security->get_gp( 'action' , 'command' , 'none' ) === 'run_sub_test' )
00397                         {
00398                               return( $this->run_sub_test() );
00399                         }
00400                         
00401                         return( 'Illegal request parameters' );
00402                   }
00403                   catch( Exception $e )
00404                   {
00405                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00406                   }
00407             }

00431             function                view( $Options )
00432             {
00433                   try
00434                   {
00435                         if( ( $Result = $this->security( $Options ) ) !== false )
00436                         {
00437                               return( $Result );
00438                         }
00439                         
00440                         return( $this->run_views() );
00441                   }
00442                   catch( Exception $e )
00443                   {
00444                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00445                   }
